name: CosmoBurg
description:
Make burgers for your space restaurant CosmoBurg. Use your state of the art space toothpick to spear those cosmic ingredients into place, and create the juiciest burger in the cosmos!

Made for the Butterscotch Shenanijam using the theme "Void Sandwich".

Movement:

W, A, S, D

You get orders in the top left of your screen, complete them by stacking ingredients in the correct order, before time runs out! If you lose 3 orders, you're fired. Time to find a new job.
